Package com.aerospike.txnSupport

Interface TxnSupport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AerospikeClientWithTxnSupport
    public interface TxnSupport

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  TxnSupport.GenFailException
      Error thrown when a Key cannot be locked due to it being locked already The id of the locking txn and the object Key are available via the Exception object
      static class  TxnSupport.LockAcquireException
      Error thrown when a Key cannot be locked due to it being locked already The id of the locking txn and the object Key are available via the Exception object
      static class  TxnSupport.TxnException
      Adds transaction id to any untrapped Aerospike Exceptions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createLock​(com.aerospike.client.Key key, java.lang.String txnID)
      Create a lock on they object identified by key Throw an error if lock cannot be acquired Lock is associated with a transaction id
      boolean lockExists​(com.aerospike.client.Key key)
      Is there currently a lock on the object identified by 'key'
      void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy, java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate)
      As above but without txnID parameter - this transaction is self-contained and atomic
      void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy, java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate, java.lang.String txnID)
      Support atomic put of multiple records - supplied as a HashMap
      void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy, java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate, java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,java.lang.Integer> generationMap)
      As above but without txnID parameter - this transaction is self-contained and atomic
      void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy, java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate, java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,java.lang.Integer> generationMap, java.lang.String txnID)
      Support atomic put of multiple records - supplied as a HashMap Additionally supports generation check where we non-transactional updates may be taking place
      void removeLock​(com.aerospike.client.Key key, java.lang.String txnID)
      Remove lock for a given key/txnID combination If combination does not exist, no action is taken
      void rollback​(java.lang.String txnID)
      Rollback a transaction identified by txnID
      boolean txnIncomplete​(java.lang.String txnID)
      Check whether there is an incomplete txn with this id
      static java.lang.String uniqueTxnID()
      Utility method to get string uuid

    • Method Detail

      • put

        void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy,
         java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate,
         java.lang.String txnID)
  throws TxnSupport.LockAcquireException
        Support atomic put of multiple records - supplied as a HashMap
        Parameters:
        policy - - write policy
        recordsForUpdate - - HashMap of records for update
        txnID - - if part of a larger transaction
        Throws:
        TxnSupport.LockAcquireException - if records updated by txn are already locked

      • put

        void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy,
         java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate,
         java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,java.lang.Integer> generationMap,
         java.lang.String txnID)
  throws TxnSupport.LockAcquireException,
         TxnSupport.GenFailException
        Support atomic put of multiple records - supplied as a HashMap Additionally supports generation check where we non-transactional updates may be taking place
        Parameters:
        policy - - write policy
        recordsForUpdate - - HashMap of records for update
        generationMap - - key:int map allowing generation check - useful as a check if working in environment where non-transactional writes are occurring
        txnID - - if part of a larger transaction
        Throws:
        TxnSupport.LockAcquireException - if records updated by txn are already locked
        TxnSupport.GenFailException - if current record generation of updated records does not match expected generation

      • put

        void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy,
         java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate,
         java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,java.lang.Integer> generationMap)
  throws TxnSupport.LockAcquireException,
         TxnSupport.GenFailException
        As above but without txnID parameter - this transaction is self-contained and atomic
        Parameters:
        policy - - write policy
        recordsForUpdate - - HashMap of records for update
        generationMap - - key:int map allowing generation check - useful as a check if working in environment where non-transactional writes are occurring
        Throws:
        TxnSupport.LockAcquireException - if records updated by txn are already locked
        TxnSupport.GenFailException - if current record generation of updated records does not match expected generation

      • put

        void put​(com.aerospike.client.policy.WritePolicy policy,
         java.util.HashMap<com.aerospike.client.Key,com.aerospike.client.Bin[]> recordsForUpdate)
  throws TxnSupport.LockAcquireException
        As above but without txnID parameter - this transaction is self-contained and atomic
        Parameters:
        policy - - write policy
        recordsForUpdate - - HashMap of records for update
        Throws:
        TxnSupport.LockAcquireException - if records updated by txn are already locked

      • rollback

        void rollback​(java.lang.String txnID)
       throws TxnSupport.LockAcquireException
        Rollback a transaction identified by txnID
        Parameters:
        txnID - txn to roll back
        Throws:
        TxnSupport.LockAcquireException

      • createLock

        void createLock​(com.aerospike.client.Key key,
                java.lang.String txnID)
         throws TxnSupport.LockAcquireException
        Create a lock on they object identified by key Throw an error if lock cannot be acquired Lock is associated with a transaction id
        Parameters:
        key - Aerospike Key for record requiring lock
        txnID - Transaction record is being locked for
        Throws:
        TxnSupport.LockAcquireException - if records updated by txn are already locked

      • removeLock

        void removeLock​(com.aerospike.client.Key key,
                java.lang.String txnID)
        Remove lock for a given key/txnID combination If combination does not exist, no action is taken
        Parameters:
        key - Aerospike Key for record requiring lock removal
        txnID - Transaction record was locked

      • lockExists

        boolean lockExists​(com.aerospike.client.Key key)
        Is there currently a lock on the object identified by 'key'
        Parameters:
        key - Aerospike Key for record whose lock is being checked
        Returns:
        boolean

      • uniqueTxnID

        static java.lang.String uniqueTxnID()
        Utility method to get string uuid
        Returns:
        randomly generated uuid as string

      • txnIncomplete

        boolean txnIncomplete​(java.lang.String txnID)
        Check whether there is an incomplete txn with this id
        Parameters:
        txnID - transaction being checked
        Returns:
        boolean
